弔詞: (ちょうし) - message of condolence; memorial address
弔銃: (ちょうじゅう) - volley of rifles at a funeral
引かされる: (ひかされる) - to be moved; to be drawn
引かす: (ひかす) - to redeem debts (e.g. of a geisha)
引かれる: (ひかれる) - to be charmed by; to be attracted to; to be taken with; to be drawn to
引き: (hiki) - influência, patrocínio, influência; puxão, influência, patrocínio; puxão; desconto
引きあう: (ひきあう) - to pay/to be profitable; to pull against each other
引きあげる: (ひきあげる) - to pull up/to drag up/to lift up; to increase/to raise (e.g. taxes); to withdraw/to leave/to pull out/to retire; to promote (someone to a higher position); to return home; to expedite the schedule
引きいれる: (ひきいれる) - to drag into; to win over
引きおこす: (ひきおこす) - to cause/to induce; to pull upright/to help up (e.g. a fallen person)
引きおろす: (ひきおろす) - to haul down; to drag down
引きかえす: (ひきかえす) - to repeat; to send back; to bring back; to retrace one's steps
引きこむ: (ひきこむ) - to pull into/to draw in/to bring in; to win over
引きこもり: (ひきこもり) - a shut-in/a stay-at-home/people who withdraw from society (e.g. retire to the country); social withdrawal/shunning other people
引きこもる: (ひきこもる) - to stay indoors; to be confined indoors
引きさがる: (ひきさがる) - to withdraw; to leave
引きさく: (ひきさく) - to tear up; to tear off; to split
引きさる: (ひきさる) - to retreat; to withdraw; to deduct
引きしぼる: (ひきしぼる) - to draw bow to limit; to draw aside curt
引きしまる: (ひきしまる) - to become tense; to be tightened
引きしめる: (ひきしめる) - to tighten; to stiffen; to brace; to strain
引きずられる: (ひきずられる) - to let oneself be persuaded; to be influenced
引きずり: (ひきずり) - train of dress/trailing skirt; woman who doesn't work and only thinks about fashion
引きずり出す: (ひきずりだす) - to drag out
引きずり回す: (ひきずりまわす) - to drag around; to pull about; to lead around (by the nose)
引きずり込む: (ひきずりこむ) - to drag in; to pull in
引きずる: (ひきずる) - to drag along/to pull; to force someone along; to prolong/to drag out; to influence strongly/to seduce
引きたつ: (ひきたつ) - to become active; to look better
引きだす: (ひきだす) - to pull out; to take out; to draw out; to withdraw
引きつぐ: (ひきつぐ) - to take over; to hand over
引きつける: (ひきつける) - to fascinate/to attract/to charm/to pull up (at a gate); (引き付ける, 引付ける, 引きつける, 引付る only) to have a convulsion
引きつる: (ひきつる) - to have a cramp (spasm, convulsion, twitch); to become stiff
引きつれる: (ひきつれる) - to take along with
引きとる: (ひきとる) - to take over/to take back/to collect/to claim; to take charge of/to take custody of/to look after/to take care of/to adopt; to retire to a private place/to withdraw/to get out
引きなおす: (ひきなおす) - to redraw (a line); to catch (a cold) again; to consult (a reference) again
引きぬく: (ひきぬく) - to extract/to uproot/to pull out; to headhunt/to lure away
引きのばす: (ひきのばす) - to stretch larger; to enlarge (photos); to delay (e.g. the end of a meeting)
引きはなす: (ひきはなす) - to pull apart; to separate
引きはらう: (ひきはらう) - to vacate; to move out
引きひも: (ひきひも) - drawstring/release cord; lead (e.g. for a dog)

引きもどす: (ひきもどす) - to bring back; to restore
引きも切らず: (ひきもきらず) - incessantly; without a break

引きわける: (ひきわける) - to pull apart; to separate
引きわたす: (ひきわたす) - to deliver; to extradite; to stretch across; to hand over
引き上げ: (ひきあげ) - pulling up/drawing up/salvage/re-flotation; raising/increase/upward revision; repatriation/evacuation
引き上げる: (ひきあげる) - to pull up/to drag up/to lift up; to increase/to raise (e.g. taxes); to withdraw/to leave/to pull out/to retire; to promote (someone to a higher position); to return home; to expedite the schedule
引き下がる: (ひきさがる) - to withdraw; to leave
引き下げる: (ひきさげる) - to pull down; to lower; to reduce; to withdraw

引き出す: (ひきだす) - to pull out; to take out; to draw out; to withdraw

引き取る: (ひきとる) - to take over/to take back/to collect/to claim; to take charge of/to take custody of/to look after/to take care of/to adopt; to retire to a private place/to withdraw/to get out
引き受ける: (ひきうける) - to be responsible for; to take over/to take up; to guarantee/to undertake; to contract (a disease)
引き受け人: (ひきうけにん) - guarantor; acceptor (e.g. promissory note); underwriter (e.g. stock issue)

引き合わせる: (ひきあわせる) - to introduce; to compare/to check; to adjust/to pull into place
